about_the_game:
GraveWatch is a horror game that will take you on one of the scariest experiences of your life. You will play as Daniel, a desperate man trying his best to support his ill daughter. After losing his wife in a horrific accident and getting fired from his job, Daniel is at the end of his wits and decides to become a grave robber, which leads him to a new chapter of his life, his fiancee Sara. Together, they form an unlikely bond, ready to take on whatever comes their way...

however...

Their newest expedition doesn't go according to plan, as they are about to face hell on earth...

Features

Immersive atmosphere: You have no weapon or way to defend yourself. You must rely on your instincts to escape the most horrifying scenarios. Hide, run or die!



Play as Sara: For some time, you get to play as Sara, Daniel's fiancee, who uses her Thermal Vision and binoculars to watch his back.



Deep storytelling: The story is told in a multitude of ways, whether it be cinematic or in-game, you will find yourself immersed in what is going to happen next!

AAA Graphics: Using the newest programming technologies, Gravewatch is an experience with beautiful yet equally terrifying landscapes, that create an atmosphere you will never forget!

Unique and unpredictable enemies: Gravewatch is not about massive amounts of monsters but rather a few memorable characters that use a variety of ways to catch up with you, making every playthrough unique in its own way.

content_descriptors.notes: Gravewatch Demo contains jumpscares, gore, and strong language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
